description: This source file defines a Qwik component for a flower generation UI, including reactive state management, lifecycle hooks, styling, and routing features.

methods.name: component$
methods.description: Registers a Qwik component that manages flower generation UI with reactive state and lifecycle management.

methods.name: useVisibleTask$
methods.description: Sets up side effects that execute when the component becomes visible, including timers for updating state.

methods.name: useStore
methods.description: Creates a reactive store object used to manage component state, including count and number of flowers.

methods.name: useStylesScoped$
methods.description: Applies scoped styles to the component from the imported CSS module.
